alert.note: Alert for Bosque (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 10 at 7:30PM CDT until June 10 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BOSQUE AND HILL COUNTIES... At 729 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Whitney, or 8 miles west of Hillsboro, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hillsboro, Whitney, Itasca, Laguna Park, Blum, Covington, Lake Whitney, Aquilla Lake, Lake Whitney State Park, Retreat, Abbott, Cedar Shores, Lakewood Harbor, Aquilla, Lovelace, Mayfield, Osceola, Woodbury, Peoria and Lakeside Village. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
